original: Saraṇaṃ pāṇinaṃ vāṇī, mayhaṃ pīṇayataṃ manaṃ.
Tathāpi tu vaḷañjenti, suddhamāgadhikā na te.
analyzed: tathā api tu vaḷañjenti suddha māgadhikāḥ na te
tena api nāma mete laṅkāra vajjite
anurūpena alaṅkāre na isa meso parissamo
yesam na sañcitā paññā neka satthantara ucitā
sammoha bbhā hatāḥ vā ete na avabujjhanti kiñcipi

original: Kiṃ tehi pādasussūsā, yesaṃ natthi garūni’ha;
analyzed: kim tehi pāda sussūsā yesam natthi garūn iha
ye tad pāda rajaḥ kiṇṇā te iva sādhū vivekinaḥ
racayanta itam na vimhaya karam param

original: Yena tosenti viññū ye, tattha pya’vihitā’darā.
Bandho ca nāma sadda,tthā, sahitā dosavajjitā;
analyzed: ca nāma saddatthā sahitā dosa vajjitā

original: Pajja gajja vimissānaṃ, bhedenā’yaṃ tidhā bhave.
analyzed: pajja gajja vimissānam bhedena ayam tidhā bhave

original: Nibandho cā’nibandho ca, puna dvidhā niruppate;
analyzed: nibandhaḥ ca anibandhaḥ ca puna dvidhā niruppate

original: Anavajjaṃ mukhambhoja “ambhoja”nti padaṃ pāḷiyaṃ natthi, vārijavācakaṃ, sakkaṭaganthato anītaṃ, manavajjā ca bhāratī;
analyzed: anavajjam mukhambhoja ambhojanti padam pāḷiyam natthi vārija vācakam sakkaṭa ganthataḥ anītam manavajjā ca bhāratī

original: Alaṅkatā’va sobhante, kiṃ nu te nira’laṅkatā?
Sampāpuṇe na viññūhi, hassabhāvaṃ kathaṃ nu so?
analyzed: sampāpuṇe na viññūhi hassa bhāvam katham nu so
yāti tad bacanīya ttam tad bohā rūpa cārataḥ
dvippakārāḥ alaṅkārāḥ tattha sadda ttha bhedato
guṇa alaṅkāra saṃyuttā api dosa lavaṅkitā

original: Pasaṃsiyā na viññūhi, sā kaññā viya tādisī.
analyzed: pasaṃsiyā na viññūhi sā kaññā viya tādisī

original: Niddosā sabbathā sā’yaṃ, saguṇā na bhaveyya kiṃ?
analyzed: niddosā sabbathā sāyam sa guṇā na bhaveyya kim
sa alaṅkāra viyuttā api guṇa yuttā manoharā
niddosā dosa rahitā guṇa yuttā vadhū

original: Pade vākye tadatthe ca, dosā ye vividhā matā;
analyzed: pade vākye tad atthe ca dosāḥ ye vividhā matā
sa udāharaṇam metesam lakkhaṇam kathayāmi aham
neyyam visesana apekkham hīna atthaka manatthakam
apakkamaḥ citya hīnam bhaggarīti sa saṃsayam
viruddha tthantaram tat hi yassaññatthaḥ virujjhati

original: Adhippete yathā megho, visado sukhaye janaṃ.
analyzed: adhippete yathā meghaḥ visadaḥ sukhaye janam

original: Visesya madhikaṃ yenā, jhattha metaṃ bhave yathā;
Kiliṭṭhaṃ taṃ yathā tāya, so’ya māliṅgyate piyā.
analyzed: kiliṭṭham tam yathā tāya sā uya māliṅgyate piyā
yam kiliṭṭha padam manda abhidheyyam yamaka ādikam
pasāda guṇa saṃyuttam yamakam mata medisam
a byapetam māvutta aneka vaṇṇa jam

original: Yamakaṃ tañca pādāna, mādi, majjha, nta, gocaraṃ.

analyzed: su jana a su janā sabbe guṇena api vivekinaḥ
vivekam na samāyanti aviveki jana antike
kusala akusalā sabbe pabala apabalā thavā
no yātāḥ sukha dukkha ppadāḥ siyuṃ

original: Sādaraṃ sā daraṃ hantu, vihitā vihitā mayā;
analyzed: sa ādaram sā daram hantu vihitā vihitā mayā
a byapeta catukka pāda ādi yamakam
kamalam kamalam kattum vanadaḥ vanada umbaram

original: Sugato sugato lokaṃ, sahitaṃ sa hitaṃ karaṃ.
analyzed: sugataḥ sugataḥ lokam sahitam sa hitam karam
a byapeta ādi yamaka ssesaḥ lesaḥ nidassito

original: Yamakaṃ taṃ pahelī paheḷi (ka.) ca, nekantamadhurāni’ti;
analyzed: yamakam tam ca na ikanta madhurān iti
upekkhiyanti sabbāni sissa kheda bhayā mayā
desa kāla kalā loka ñāya āgama virodhi yaṃ

original: Ya dappatīta mānīya, vattabbaṃ neyya māhu taṃ;
analyzed: ya mā ānīya vattabbam na iyya mā āhu tam

original: Yathā sabbāpi dhavalā, disā rocanti rattiyaṃ.
analyzed: yathā sabbā api dhavalāḥ disāḥ rocanti rattiyam

original: Nedisaṃ bahu maññanti, sabbe sabbattha viññuno;
analyzed: nedisam bahu maññanti sabbe sabbattha viññunaḥ

original: Siyā visesanāpekkhaṃ, yaṃ taṃ patvā visesanaṃ;
analyzed: siyā visesana apekkham yam tam patvā visesanam

original: Sātthakaṃ taṃ yathā taṃ so, bhiyyo passati cakkhunā.
analyzed: sātthakam tam yathā tam so bhiyyas passati cakkhunā

original: Hīnaṃ kare visesyaṃ yaṃ, taṃ hīnatthaṃ bhave yathā;
analyzed: hīnam kare visesyam yam tam hīnattham bhave yathā
pāda pūraṇa mattam yam anattham iti tam matam

original: Yathā hi vande buddhassa, pādapaṅkeruhaṃ pi ca.
analyzed: yathā hi vande buddhassa pāda paṅkeruham pi ca

original: Saddato atthato vuttaṃ, yattha bhiyyopi vuccati;
analyzed: saddataḥ atthataḥ vuttam yattha bhiyyas api vuccati

original: Ta mekatthaṃ yathā’bhāti, vārido vārido ayaṃ.
analyzed: tam mekattham yathā ābhāti vāridaḥ vāridaḥ ayam
titthiya aṅkura bījāni jaham diṭṭhi gatāni iha
pasāda iti pasanna isaḥ mahā muni mahājane
āraddha kkama vicchedā bhaggarī iti bhave yathā

original: Kāpi paññā, kopi paguṇo, pakatīpi aho tava.
analyzed: kā api paññā kaḥ api paguṇaḥ aho tava
visiṭṭha vacana apetam gāmmaṃti abhimatam yathā

original: Kaññe kāmayamānaṃ maṃ, na kāmayasi kiṃnvi’daṃ?
analyzed: kaññe kāmayamānam mama na kāmayasi kiṃnu idam
pada sandhānataḥ kiñci duppatīti karam bhave

original: Tampi gāmmaṃ tya’bhimataṃ, yathā yābhavato piyā.
Vuttesu sūcite ṭṭhāne, padacchedo bhave yati;
analyzed: vuttesu sūcite ṭṭhāne padacchedaḥ bhave yati

original: Yaṃ tāya hīnaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, yatihīnanti sā pana.
analyzed: yam tāya hīnam tam vuttam yati hīnam ti sā pana
yati sabbattha pāda ante vutta ḍḍhe ca visesato
pubba apara aneka vaṇṇa pada majjhe pi katthaci

original: Taṃ name sirasā cāmi, karavaṇṇaṃ tathāgataṃ;
analyzed: tam name sirasā ca āmi karavaṇṇam tathāgatam

original: Sakalāpi disā siñca, tiva soṇṇarasehi yo.
Saro sandhimhi pubbanto, viya lope vibhattiyā;
analyzed: sa raḥ sandhimhi pubba antaḥ viya lope vibhattiyā
aññathā tu aññathā tattha parāt iva
ca ādī pubba pada antā ava niccam pubba pada ssitā
pa ādayaḥ nicca sambandhā para ādi iva parena tu

original: Name taṃ sirasā sabbo, pamā’tītaṃ tathāgataṃ;
analyzed: name tam sirasā pamā atītam tathāgatam

original: Yassa lokaggataṃ patta, sso’pamā na hi yujjati.
analyzed: yassa lokaggatam pattaḥ ssa upamā na hi yujjati

original: Munindaṃ taṃ sadā vandā, mya’nantamati muttamaṃ;
Yassa paññā ca mettā ca, nissīmāti vijambhati.
analyzed: yassa paññā ca mettā ca vijambhati
ca ādi pādīsu pacc udāharaṇāni yathā
mahāmettā mahāpaññā ca yattha parama udayā

original: Paṇamāmi jinaṃ taṃ pa, varaṃ varaguṇā’layaṃ.
analyzed: paṇamāmi jinam tam varam vara guṇa ālayam

original: Khettaṃ vā dehi gāmaṃ vā, desaṃ vā mama sobhanaṃ.
analyzed: khettam vā dehi gāmam vā desam vā mama sobhanam
lokiyattha m atikkantam ativuttam matam yathā
atisambādha mā akāsa mā itissā thana jambhane
samudāya ttha tā upetam tam apeta tthakam yathā

original: Gāviputto balibaddho, tiṇaṃ khādī pivī jalaṃ.
analyzed: gāvi puttaḥ balibaddhaḥ tiṇam khādī jalaṃ

original: Bandhe pharusatā yattha, taṃ bandhapharusaṃ yathā;
analyzed: bandhe pharusa tā yattha tam bandha pharusam yathā

original: Kharā khilā parikkhīṇā, khette khittaṃ phalatya’laṃ.
analyzed: kharā khilā parikkhīṇā khette khittam phalati alam
ñeyyam lakkhaṇa manvattha vasena apakkam ādinam
udāharaṇa mā etesam dāni sandassayāmi aham
bhāvanā dāna sīlāni sammā sampāditāni iha

original: Bhoga, saggādi, nibbāna, sādhanāni na saṃsayo.
analyzed: bhoga sagga ādi nibbāna sādhanāni na saṃsayaḥ
pūjanīyataraḥ loke aha m ekaḥ nirantaram

original: Mayekasmiṃ guṇā sabbe, yato samuditā ahuṃ.
analyzed: mayā ekasmin guṇā sabbe yatas samuditāḥ ahum

original: Yācito’haṃ kathaṃ nāma, na dajjāmya’pi jīvitaṃ;
analyzed: yācitaḥ uham katham nāma na dajjāmi api jīvitam
tathā api putta dānena vedhate hadayam mama
itthīnam dujjanānam ca vissāsaḥ na upapajjate

original: Vise siṅgimhi nadiyaṃ, roge rājakulamhi ca.
analyzed: vise siṅgimhi nadiyam roge rājakulamhi ca
janaḥ vakkanta panthāḥ iva gopa dassana pīṇitaḥ

original: Vākyatthato duppatīti, karaṃ gāmmaṃ mataṃ yathā;
Poso vīriyavā so’yaṃ, paraṃ hantvā na vissamī.
analyzed: posaḥ vīriya vā saḥ uyam param hantvā na vissamī
tam atthi ce kheda karam param pi
iti saṅgharakkhita mahā sāmi viracite subodhālaṅkāre
dosa saṅkhya matikkamma guṇa vīthim vigāhate
tena vutta virodhāna ma virodhaḥ yathā siyā
tathā dosa parihārā avabodhaḥ dāni nīyate
tattha viruddha attha antarassa parihāraḥ yathā

original: Taṃ kathaṃ nāma megho’yaṃ, visado sukhaye janaṃ?
analyzed: tam katham nāma meghoyam sukhaye janam
vināyakaḥ api nāgaḥ si gotamaḥ api mahāmati

original: Paṇītopi rasā’peto, cittā me sāmi te gati.

analyzed: katham ta ādi guṇa abhāve lokam toseti dujjanaḥ

original: Pahelikāya paheḷikāya (ka.) māruḷhā, na hi duṭṭhā kiliṭṭhatā;
analyzed: pahelikāya paheḷikāya ka mā āruḷhā na hi duṭṭhā kiliṭṭha tā

original: Piyā sukhā’liṅgitaṃ ka, māliṅgati nu no iti.
analyzed: sukha āliṅgitam ka mā āliṅgati nu no iti
yamake no payojeyya kiliṭṭha pada micchite

original: Tato yamaka maññaṃ tu, sabba metaṃmayaṃ viya.

analyzed: nudantān iva su cirāḥ vāsa klesam tahim jale
sabbotuka mayam vāyi dhunantaḥ kusumam samam

original: Tantissara virodho so, na sampīṇeti kaṃ janaṃ?
analyzed: tantissara virodhaḥ saḥ na sampīṇeti kam janam
pariccatta bhavaḥ api tva m upanīta bhavaḥ asi
acintya guṇa sārāya namaḥ te muni puṅgava
na iva ālapati kena api vacī viññattitaḥ yati
sampajāna musā vādā phuseyya āpatti dukkaṭam

original: Imā sabbāpi dhavalā, disā rocanti nibbharaṃ.
analyzed: imāḥ sabbā api dhavalāḥ disāḥ rocanti nibbharam
jinena a samanuññātaḥ mārassa hadaya analaḥ
kodha pāṭala bhūtena bhiyyo passati cakkhunā
appakānam pi pāpānam pabhāvam na āsaye budhaḥ
na pāda pūraṇa tthāya padam yojeyya katthaci
yathā vande muni ndassa pāda paṅkeruham varam
bhaya kodha pasaṃsa ādi visesaḥ tādisaḥ yadi

original: Sappo sappo! Ayaṃ handa, nivattatu bhavaṃ tato,
analyzed: sappaḥ sappaḥ ayam handa nivattatu bhavam tatas
yadi jīvitu kāmaḥ asi katham tam upasappasi
a byāmoha karam bandham a byākiṇṇam manoharam

original: Dunoti kāmacaṇḍālo, so maṃ sadaya niddayo;
analyzed: dunoti kāma caṇḍālo saḥ mam niddayaḥ
yati hīna parihāraḥ na punar idāni nīyate

original: Yato na savanu’bbegaṃ, heṭṭhā yesaṃ vicāritaṃ.

analyzed: udāra caritā usi tvam tena iva ārādhanā tvayi

original: Desaṃ vā dehi gāmaṃ vā, khettaṃ vā mama sobhanaṃ.
analyzed: desam vā dehi gāmam vā khettam vā mama sobhanam
sakalaḥ upi ayam mā akāsaḥ na avakāsaḥ vijambhane

samuddaḥ pīyate sa uya jarā āturaḥ
ime gajjanti jīmūtā sakkassa irāvaṇaḥ piyaḥ
bandhanam bandha pharusa dosam saṃdūsayeyya tam
passantā rūpa vibhavam suṇantā madhuram giram
caranti sādhu sambuddha kāle keḷi parammukhā
bhāvanā dāna sīlāni sammā sampāditāni iha

original: Nibbāna, bhoga, saggādi, sādhanāni na saṃsayo.
analyzed: nibbāna bhoga sagga ādi sādhanāni na saṃsayaḥ
uddiṭṭha visayaḥ koci visesaḥ tādisaḥ yadi
an uddiṭṭhesu na iva atthi dosaḥ kama vilaṅghane

abyākatam pāka dam na pāka dam paṭhama dvayam
ocitya hīna tā āpatti natthi bhūtattha saṃsino

original: Ocityaṃ nāma viññeyyaṃ, loke vikhyāta mādarā;
analyzed: ocityam nāma viññeyyam loke vikhyāta mādarā
viññāta ucitya vibhavaḥ citya hīnam parihare
yaḥ mā ārasena mā āsanna vijayuḥ savaḥ

original: Tiṇāyapi na maññittha, so vo detu jayaṃ jino.
analyzed: na maññittha saḥ vaḥ detu jayam jino
āraddha kattu kamma ādi kama atikkama laṅghane
bhagga rīti virodhaḥ yam gatim na kvāpi vindati
su jana ññāna mitthīnam vissāsaḥ na upapajjate
visassa siṅginaḥ roga nadī rāja kulassa ca
bhesajje vihite suddha buddha ādi rata nattaye

original: Pasāda mācare niccaṃ, sajjane saguṇepi ca.
analyzed: pasāda mā ācare niccam sat jane sa guṇe api ca
saṃsayāya iva yaṃkiñci yadi kīḷā ādi hetunā

viññāyi imam garu vara anadhika pasādā
iti saṅgharakkhita mahā sāmi viracite subodhālaṅkāre

original: Dassessaṃ te tato dāni, sadde sambhūsayanti ye.
analyzed: dassessam te tatas dāni sadde sambhūsayanti ye
pasāda ojaḥ madhura tā sama tā sukhumāla tā

sobhanta iruṇa raṃsī iva sampatantā ambuja udare

original: Muninda manda sañjāta, hāsa candana limpitā;
analyzed: muninda manda sañjāta hāsa candana limpitā

original: Yaṃ pāriṇatyaṃ hotī’ha, sopi ojo’va taṃ yathā.

analyzed: jalitvā aggi khandhaḥ iva nibbutaḥ saḥ sa sāvakaḥ
mattha kaṭṭhī matassa api rajaḥ bhāvam vajantu me

original: Yato puññena te sentu, jina pāda’mbujadvaye.
analyzed: yatas puññena te sentu jina pāda ambuja dvaye

original: Siyā samasuti pubbā, vaṇṇā’vutti paro yathā.
analyzed: siyā sama suti pubbā vaṇṇā vutti paraḥ yathā

original: Tadā pabhuti dhammassa, loke jāto mahu’ssavo.
analyzed: tadā dhammassa loke jātaḥ mahu ssavaḥ
muninda manda hāsā te kunda sandoha vibbhamā
sabba komala vaṇṇehi na anuppāsaḥ pasaṃsiyo

original: Mudūhi vā kevalehi, kevalehi phuṭehi vā,
Missehi vā tidhā hoti, vaṇṇehi samatā yathā.
analyzed: missehi vā tidhā hoti vaṇṇehi samatā yathā

original: Hadayaṅgamataṃ yāti, sataṃ deti ca nibbutiṃ.

analyzed: manda mā āyāti bhītā uva muninda mukha mārutā

original: Caranti sādhū sādhu (sī-chandhānurakkhaṇatthaṃ) sambuddha, kāle keḷiparammukhā.
analyzed: caranti sādhu sādhu sī chandha anurakkhaṇa attham sambuddha kāle keḷi parammukhāḥ
yathā mata ādi saddesu kitti sesa ādi kittanam

original: Sabandhagāravo so’yaṃ, sileso nāma taṃ yathā.
analyzed: sa bandha gāravaḥ saḥ yam silesaḥ nāma tam yathā

udārā uyam bhave tena sanāthā bandha paddhati

original: Pādambhoja rajo litta, gattā ye tava gotama;
analyzed: pādambhoja rajaḥ litta gattāḥ ye tava gotama

original: Aho! Te jantavo yanti, sabbathā nirajattanaṃ.

analyzed: evam jina anubhāvassa samukkaṃso tra dissati

original: Udāro sopi viññeyyo, yaṃ pasattha visesanaṃ;
analyzed: udāraḥ saḥ api viññeyyaḥ yam pasattha visesanam
yathā kīḷāsaraḥ līlā hāsaḥ hemaṅgada ādayaḥ
lokiya tthā an atikkantā kantā sabba janān api
yathā munindaḥ i t ca ādi
sāyam tat ubhayā neyya parihāre padassitā
yathā marīci cca ādi ca manaḥ nurañjana ucca ādi
sabhā vāma latāḥ dhīra mudhā pāda nakhesu te
bandha sārā iti maññanti yam samaggā api viññunaḥ

original: Apāṇe pāṇīnaṃ dhammo, sammā ādhīyate kvaci,;
analyzed: apāṇe pāṇīnam dhammaḥ sammā ādhīyate kvaci

a drave drava yuttassa a kattari pi kattu tā

original: Uṇṇā puṇṇi’ndunā nātha! Divāpi saha saṅgamā;
analyzed: uṇṇā puṇṇindunā nātha divā api saha saṅgamā
dayā rasesu mujjantā jana amata rasesu iva

original: Madhurepi guṇe dhīra, na’ppasīdanti ye tava;
analyzed: madhure api guṇe dhīra na ppasīdanti ye tava

original: Disā samantā dhāvanti, kundasobhā sa lakkhaṇā.
analyzed: disā samantā dhāvanti kunda sobhā sa lakkhaṇā

lajjamāna aññavesena jina pāda ānatā tava
saddhamma raṃsinā bhāti bhinda mandatamam param

original: Atisundara maññaṃ tu, kāmaṃ vindati gāmmataṃ.
analyzed: ati sundara tu kāmam vindati gāmmatam

original: Bhāsanto madhuraṃ dhammaṃ, kaṃ na sappīṇaye janaṃ.
analyzed: bhāsantaḥ madhuram dhammam kam na sappīṇaye janam
yaḥ sadda sattha kusalaḥ kusalaḥ nighaṇḍu
iti saṅgharakkhita mahā sāmi viracite subodhālaṅkāre

original: Accantakantā kantā yato accantakantā (ka.) va vuccante te tato’dhunā.
analyzed: accanta kantā kantā yatas accanta kantā vuccante te tatodhunā
paṭhamā tattha vatthūnam nānā vatthā vibhāvinī

original: Līlā vikanti subhago, disā thira vilokano;

analyzed: vutti vatthu sabhāvassa yā aññathā sā aparā bhave
tassa ananta vikappa ttā hoti bīja upadassanam
tattha atisayaḥ upamā rūpakā vutti dīpakam

original: Parivutti, bbhamo, bhāvo, missa, māsī, rasī, iti.
Ete bhedā samuddiṭṭhā, bhāvo jīvita muccate;
Vaṅkavuttīsu posesi, sileso tu siriṃ paraṃ.
analyzed: vaṅka vuttīsu silesaḥ tu sirim param
pakāsakā visesassa siyā atisaya vutti yā
loka atikkanta visayā lokiyā ati ca sā dvidhā
pivanti deha kantī ye na id tad añjali puṭena te

original: Nā’laṃ hantuṃ jine’saṃ tvaṃ, taṇhaṃ taṇhāharopi kiṃ?
analyzed: na alam hantum jinesam tvam taṇham kim
upamāna upameyyānam sa dhammattam siyā upamā

original: Sadda, tthagammā, vākyattha, visayā,ti ca sā bhidhā.
Samāsa, paccaye, vā’dī, saddā tesaṃ vasā tidhā;
analyzed: samāsa paccaye vādī saddā tesam vasā tidhā
saddagammā samāsena muni indo candi mānanaḥ

original: Ivādī iva, vā, tulya, samāna, nibha, sannibhā;
analyzed: ivādī iva vā tulya samāna nibha sannibhā

original: Sarī, sarikkha, saṃvādī, virodhi, sadisā, viya;
analyzed: sarī sarikkha saṃvādī virodhi sadisā viya
paṭipakkha paccanīkā sa pakkhaḥ pamitaḥ pamā

original: Savaṇṇā, bhā, paṭinidhi, sadhammā, di salakkhaṇā.
analyzed: savaṇṇā bhā paṭinidhi sadhammā di salakkhaṇā
jayati a kkosati hasati patigajjati dūbhati

original: Tassa coreti sobhaggaṃ, tassa kantiṃ vilumpati;
analyzed: tassa coreti sobhaggam tassa kantim vilumpati
tena saddhim vivadati tulyam tena adhirohati

original: Kacchaṃ vigāhate, tassa, ta manvetya, nubandhati;
analyzed: kaccham vigāhate tassa ta manu etya nubandhati
taṃsīlam taṃnisedha iti tassa ca anukaroti me
iti dhammopamā nāma tulya dhamma nidassanā
viparītā upamā tulya mānanena ambujam tava
tava ānanam iva ambhojam ambhojam iva te mukham
dhāretum mukha sobham tam tava iti abbhuta upamā
sugandhi sobhā sambandhī sisiraṃsu virodhi ca
sarūpa saddavāt cattā sā santāna upamā yathā

original: Khayī cando, bahurajaṃ, padumaṃ, tehi te mukhaṃ;
analyzed: khayī candaḥ bahu rajam padumam tehi te mukham
jaḷo kalaṅkī iti ayam paṭisedha upamā siyā
kaccham canda aravindānam atikkamma mukham tava
attanāva samam jāta miti asādhāraṇa upamā
sabba ambhoja ppabhā sāraḥ rāsi bhūtaḥ uva katthaci
tava ānanam vibhāti iti hotā abhūta upamāḥ ayam

original: Samāsa, ppaccaye, vādi, saddayogaṃ vinā api.
analyzed: samāsa vādi sadda yogam vinā api
yatas ambuje pi sā atthi iti parikappa upamā ayam
mama dolāyate cittam miccayam saṃsaya upamā
janesu jāyamānesu na ikaḥ api jina sādisaḥ
dutiyaḥ nanu nattha iva pārijātassa pādapaḥ
vākya atthena iva vākya atthaḥ yadi kocu upamīyate
iva yuttā viyut tattā sā vākyattha upamā dvidhā
ghamma santāpa tattānam ghamma kāla imbudaḥ viya
munin dānana mā ābhāti vilāsa ika manoharam

original: Uddhaṃ samuggatassā’pi, kiṃ te canda vijambhanā.
analyzed: uddham samuggatassa api kim te canda vijambhanā
samubbeja iti dhīmantam bhinna liṅga ādikam tu yam
upamā dūsanāya ala mā etam katthacid tam yathā

original: Haṃsī’vā’yaṃ sasī bhinna, liṅgā, kāsaṃ sarāni’va;
analyzed: haṃsī iva ayam sasī bhinna liṅgā kāsam sarān iva

original: Vijāti vacanā, hīnā, sā’va bhatto bhaṭo’dhipe.

analyzed: khajjotaḥ bhāṇumālī iva vibhāti iti adhikā upamā
khaṇḍitā kerava ākāraḥ sa kalaṅkaḥ nisākaraḥ

original: Karonti cā’daraṃ dhīrā, payoge kvaci de’va tu.
Piyo pāṇā ivā’yaṃ me, vijjā dhana’miva’ccitā.
analyzed: piyaḥ pāṇāḥ iva ayam me vijjā dhanam iva citā
alam aṃsumataḥ kaccham tejasā rohitum ayam

original: Asesa vatthu visayaṃ, ekadesa vivutti vivatti (ṭīkā), ca;
analyzed: asesa vatthu visayaṃ ekadesa vivutti vivatti ṭīkā ca

original: Taṃ dvidhā puna paccekaṃ, samāsādivasā tidhā.
Sirasā na pilandhanti, ke muninda pada’mbujaṃ.
analyzed: sirasā na pilandhanti ke muninda pada ambujam

original: Ratanāni guṇā bhūrī, karuṇā sītalaṃ jalaṃ;
analyzed: ratanāni guṇāḥ bhūrī karuṇā sītalam jalam
asesa vatthu visaye pabhedaḥ rūpake ayam
eka desa vivuttimhi bhedaḥ dāni pavuccati
vilāsa hāsa kusumam rucira adhara pallavam

original: Sukhaṃ ke vā na vindanti, passantā munino mukhaṃ.
analyzed: sukham ke vā na vindanti passantāḥ munino mukham

original: Rūpakāni bahūnye’va ṭīkāyaṃ uddhaṭaṃ yuttarūpakaṃ sitapupphujalaṃ lola, nettabhiṅga tavā’nanaṃ; kassa nāma mano dhīra, nākaḍḍhati manoharaṃ;, yuttā, yuttādibhedato;
analyzed: rūpakāni bahūni eva uddhaṭam yutta rūpakam sita pupphu jalam lola netta bhiṅga tava ānanam kassa nāma manaḥ dhīra na ākaḍḍhati manoharam yuttāḥ yutta ādi bhedataḥ

original: Natthi yaṃ tena viññeyyaṃ, avutta manumānato.
Punappuna muccāraṇaṃ punappunuccāraṇaṃ yaṃ, yamatthassa, padassa ca;
analyzed: punar punar uccāraṇam punar puna uccāraṇam yaṃ yam atthassa padassa ca

original: Mano harati sabbesaṃ, ādadāti disā dasa;
analyzed: manaḥ harati sabbesam ādadāti disāḥ dasa
vibhāsenti disā sabbāḥ munino deha kantiyaḥ

original: Vibhā senti ca sabbāpi, candādīnaṃ hatā viya.
analyzed: vibhā senti ca sabbā api canda ādīnam hatā viya

original: Jitvā viharati klesa, ripuṃ loke jino ayaṃ;
analyzed: jitvā viharati klesa ripum loke jinaḥ ayam
ekattha vattamānam api sabba vākya upakārakam

original: Dīpakaṃ nāma taṃ cādi, majjha, ntavisayaṃ tidhā.
analyzed: dīpakam nāma tam ca ādi majjha nta visayam tidhā
sabba pāpehi ca samam neka titthiya maddanam
tad aññesam tu jantūnam visam nicca upatāpanam
accanta kanta lāvaṇya canda ātapa manoharo

original: Jinā’nani’ndu indu ca, kassa nā’nandako bhave.

analyzed: hotā a vippaṭisārāya sīlam pāma ujjahetu saḥ

original: Taṃ pītihetu, sā cā’yaṃ, passaddhyā’di pasiddhiyā.
analyzed: tam pīti hetu sā ca ayam passaddhi ādi
iccādi dīpaka tte pi pubbam pubbam mapekkhinī
visesa vacanicchāyam nisedha vacanam tu yam
akkhepaḥ nāma so yat ca tidhā kāla ppabhedato

original: Ekākī’ nekasenaṃ taṃ, māraṃ sa vijayī jino;
analyzed: ekākī neka senam tam māram sa vijayī jino

original: Kathaṃ ta mathavā tassa, pāramībala mīdisaṃ.

analyzed: kim cit tejā samugghātam a pattaḥ asmi iti khijjase

original: Paṇāmo nanu so ye’va, sakimpi sugate gato.
Saccaṃ na te gamissanti, sivaṃ sujanagocaraṃ;
analyzed: saccam na te gamissanti sivam su jana gocaram

original: Micchādiṭṭhi parikkanta parikanta (ka.), mānasā ye sudujjanā.

analyzed: sabba byāpī visesaṭṭhaḥ hi visiṭṭhassa bhedato

original: Tepi lokahitā sattā, sūriyo candimā api;
analyzed: te api loka hitā sattā sūriyaḥ candimāḥ api

original: Atthaṃ passa gamissanti, niyamo kena laṅghyate.
analyzed: attham passa gamissanti niyamaḥ kena laṅghyate
satthā deva manussānam vasī saḥ api munissaraḥ

original: Gato’va nibbutiṃ sabbe, saṅkhārā na hi sassatā.
analyzed: gataḥ uva nibbutim sabbe saṅkhārāḥ na hi sassatā

original: Jino saṃsārakantārā, janaṃ pāpeti pāpesi (ka.) nibbutiṃ;
analyzed: jinaḥ saṃsāra kantārā janam pāpeti pāpesi ka nibbutim

original: Nanu yuttā gati sā’yaṃ, vesārajja samaṅginaṃ.

analyzed: su rattam tedhara phuṭam jina rañja iti mānasam

original: Sayaṃ rāgaparītā hi, pare rañjenti saṅgate.
analyzed: sayam rāga parītāḥ hi pare rañjenti saṅga te

original: Vācce gamme tha vatthūnaṃ, sadisatte pabhedanaṃ;
analyzed: vācce gamme tha vatthūnam sadisatte pabhedanam

original: Tulyo tva masi bhedo tu, sarīrene’disena te.

analyzed: mahāsattā ati gambhīrā sāgaraḥ sugataḥ api ca
na santāpa apaham na ivi chita dam miga locanam
muninda nayana dvandam tava tad guṇa bhūsitam
muninda ānana mambhoja mā isam nānatta mīdisam

original: Na hoti khalu dujjanya, mapi dujjanasaṅgame;
analyzed: na khalu dujjanyam api dujjana saṅgame

original: Janako, ñāpako ceti, duvidhā hetavo siyuṃ;
analyzed: janakaḥ ñāpakaḥ ca iti duvidhāḥ hetavaḥ siyum

original: Munino desanā’yaṃ me, kāmaṃ toseti mānasaṃ.

analyzed: mukhena iva su bodham te manam pāpa abhinissaṭam
sādhu hattha aravindāni saṅkocayati te katham

original: Ālāpa hāsa līḷāhi, muninda! Vijayā tava;
analyzed: ālāpa hāsa līḍāhi muninda vijayā tava

original: Kokilā kumudāni co, pasevante vanaṃ jalaṃ.
analyzed: kokilā kumudāni ca u pasevante vanam jalam
siyā piyataram nāma attha rūpassa kassaci
piyassa atisayena itam yam hoti paṭipādanam

original: Pītiyā me samuppannā, santa! Sandassanā tava;
analyzed: pītiyā me samuppannā santa sandassanā tava

original: Kālenā’yaṃ bhave pīti, tave’va puna dassanā.
analyzed: kālena ayam bhave tava iva puna dassanā
samāsa vutti nāma ayam attha saṅkhepa rūpataḥ
sāyam visesya mattena bhinna abhinna visesanā
attha iva aparā pi atthi bhinna abhinna visesanā
sabbe sādhāraṇāḥ dhammāḥ pubbatra aññatra tuttayam
vatthunā uñña ppakārena ṭhitā vutti tad aññathā
icchā bhaṅga ātura āsīnā mad śarā

original: Vasaṃ nenti’va dhīraṃ taṃ, tadā yogā’bhiyogato.
Muninda! Pādadvande te, cāru rājiva sundare;
analyzed: muninda pāda dvande te cāru sundare
maññe pāpa abhisammadda jāta soṇena soṇimā

original: Maññe, saṅke, dhuvaṃ, nūna, miva, micceva mādihi;
analyzed: maññe saṅke dhuvam nūna miva micca iva mā ādihi

original: Sā’yaṃ byañjīyate kvā’pi, kvā’pi vākyena gamyate.
analyzed: sāyam byañjīyate kvāpi kvāpi vākyena gamyate
dayā sañjāta sarasā dehā nikkhanta kantiyaḥ

original: Pīṇentā jina! Te sādhu, janaṃ sarasataṃ nayuṃ.

analyzed: ārabbhantassa yaṃ kiñci kattum puññavasā puna
māra ari bhaṅga abhimukha mānasaḥ tassa satthunaḥ
mahā mahī mahā ravam ravī iyam upakārikā
dhana kāma yathākāmam tuvam gaccha yat icchasi

original: Thutiṃ karoti nindanto, viya taṃ byājavaṇṇanaṃ;
analyzed: thutim karoti nindantaḥ viya tam byāja vaṇṇanam

original: Dosā’bhāsā guṇā eva, yanti sannidhi matra hi.
analyzed: dosa ābhāsāḥ guṇāḥ eva yanti sannidhi matra hi

original: Visesaṃ tāvatā nātha!, Guṇānaṃ te vadāma kiṃ?
analyzed: visesam tāvatā nātha te vadāma kim

original: Visesi’cchāyaṃ dabbassa, kriyā, jāti, guṇassa ca;
analyzed: visesi chāyam dabbassa kriyā jāti guṇassa ca

original: Vekalladassanaṃ yatra, viseso nāma yaṃ bhave.
analyzed: vekalla dassanam yatra visesaḥ nāma yam bhave

original: Na rathā, na ca mātaṅgā, na hayā, na padātayo;
analyzed: na rathāḥ na ca mātaṅgāḥ na hayāḥ na padātayaḥ
jitaḥ mārāri muninā sambhārāvat janena hi

original: Na baddhā bhūkuṭi, neva, phurito dasanacchado;
analyzed: na baddhā bhūkuṭi nā iva phuritaḥ dasanacchadaḥ

original: Mārāribhaṅgaṃ cā’kāsi, muni vīro varo sayaṃ.

analyzed: na disāsu byāttā tatā ka raṃsi
tathā api andhatama haram param sādhu su bhāsitam

original: Na kharaṃ, na hi vā thaddhaṃ, muninda! Vacanaṃ tava;
analyzed: na kharam na hi vā thaddham muninda vacanam tava
tathā api gāḷham khaṇati nimmūlam janatā madam
vadanti viññū vacanam ruḷha ahaṅkāra mīdisam
dame nanda upanandassa kim me byāpāra dassanā

original: Puttā me pādasambhattā, sajjā sante’va tādise.
analyzed: puttāḥ me pāda sambhattāḥ sajjā santā iva tādise
silesaḥ vacana aneka abhidheyī eka pada ayutam

original: Sugato visadaṃ pātu, pāṇinaṃ so vināyako.

analyzed: bhinna abhinna pada vākya si lesaḥ

original: Viruddhā, viruddhā, bhinna, kammā, niyamavā, paro;
analyzed: viruddhā viruddhā bhinna kammā niyamavā paro
niyama kkhepa vacanaḥ avirodhi virodhi api

original: Ocitya samposakādi, sileso, padajā’di padajāti (ka.) pi;
analyzed: ocitya samposaka ādi sileso padaja ādi padajāti ka pi
sabhāva madhuram puñña visesa udaya sambhavam

original: Suṇanti vācaṃ munino, janā passanti cā’mataṃ.
analyzed: suṇanti vācam muninaḥ janāḥ passanti ca amatam

original: Mano pīṇeti jantūnaṃ, jino vācāya bhāya ca.
analyzed: manaḥ pīṇa iti jantūnam jinaḥ vācāya bhāya ca
pāṇi pāda adharesu eva sa ārāgo tava dissati
dissate sā uya nātha sādhu guṇesu api

original: Sadayo pya’dayo pāpe, cittā’yaṃ munino gati.
analyzed: sa dayaḥ pi adayaḥ pāpe muninaḥ
saṃsāra dukkha upahatā vanatā janatā tvayi
guṇa yuttehi vatthūhi samam katvāna kassaci

original: Saṃkittanaṃ bhavati yaṃ, sā matā tulyayogitā.
analyzed: saṃkittanam bhavati yam sā matā tulya yogitā

original: Ubhohi raṃsimālī ca, bhagavā ca tamonudo.
Atthantaraṃ sādhayatā, kiñci taṃ sadisaṃ phalaṃ;
analyzed: atthantaram sādhayatā kiñci tam sadisam phalam

original: Dassīyate asantaṃ vā, santaṃ vā taṃ nidassanaṃ.
analyzed: dassīyate asantam vā santam vā tam nidassanam
vibhūtiyāḥ mahanta ttam adhippāyassa vā siyā
kirīṭa ratana chāyā nuviddha ātapa vāraṇo

original: Purā paraṃ siriṃ vindi, bodhisatto’ bhinikkhamā.
Satto sambodhiyaṃ bodhi, satto sattahitāya so;
analyzed: satto sambodhiyam bodhi satto satta hitāya so
hitvā sneha rasa ābandham mapi rāhula mātaram

original: Gopetvā vaṇṇanīyaṃ yaṃ, kiñci dassīyate paraṃ;
analyzed: gopetvā vaṇṇanīyam yam kiñci dassīyate param

original: Asamaṃ vā samaṃ tassa, yadi sā vañcanā matā.
analyzed: asamam vā samam yadi sā vañcanā matā

original: Purato na sahassesu, na pañcesu ca tādino;
analyzed: puratas na sahassesu na pañcesu ca tādinaḥ
māro paresu tassa isam sahassam dasa vaḍḍhitam

original: Sampuṇṇo candimā nā’yaṃ, chatta metaṃ manobhuno.
analyzed: sampuṇṇaḥ candimā nāyam chatta mā etam manobhunaḥ
thuti rappa kate sāyam siyā appa kata tthuti
sukham jīvanti hariṇāḥ vanesva para sevinaḥ
uttaram uttaram yattha pubba pubba visesanam

original: Siyā ekāvali sā’yaṃ, dvidhā vidhi, nisedhato.
Pādā nakhāli rucirā, nakhāli raṃsi bhāsurā;
analyzed: pādā nakha āli rucirā nakha āli raṃsi bhāsurā

original: Nā’layo yo sa jantūnaṃ, nā’nanta byasanā vaho.
Yahiṃ bhūsiya bhūsattaṃ, aññamaññaṃ tu vatthunaṃ;
analyzed: yahim bhūsiya bhūsattam aññamaññam tu vatthunam
vinā ava sadisa ttam tam aññam añña vibhūsanam

original: Mahantiṃ vindatī kantiṃ, sopi teneva tādisiṃ.
analyzed: mahantim vindatī kantim saḥ upi tena iva tādisim

original: Kathanaṃ sahabhāvassa, kriyāya ca, guṇassa ca;
analyzed: kathanam sahabhāvassa kriyāya ca guṇassa ca
sahavuttī iti viññeyyam tat udāharaṇam yathā

original: Jalanti candaraṃsīhi, samaṃ satthu nakhaṃ savo;
analyzed: jalanti canda raṃsīhi samam satthu nakham
jina udayena malīnam saha dujjana cetasā

original: Pāpaṃ disā suvimalā, saha sajjana cetasā.
analyzed: pāpam disā su vimalā saha sat jana cetasā
samukkaṃsa abhidhāna attham matā sāyam virodhitā

original: Guṇā sabhāva madhurā, api loke’ka bandhuno;
analyzed: guṇā sabhāva madhurā api lokeka bandhuno
sevitā pāpa sevīnam sampad ūsenti mānasam

original: Yassa kassa ci dānena, yassa kassa ci vatthuno;
analyzed: yassa kassa ci dānena yassa kassa ci vatthuno
visiṭṭhassa ya mā ādānam parivuttī iti sā matā

original: Muninā samanuppattā, dāni sabbaññutāsirī muninda! samanuppatto, dāni sabbaññutāsiriṃ (ka.).
analyzed: muninā samanuppattā dāni sabbaññu tā sirī muninda samanuppattaḥ dāni sabbaññu tā sirim ka

original: Saṃsayā’pagataṃ vatthuṃ, yattha so’yaṃ bhamo mato.
analyzed: saṃsaya apagatam vatthum yattha saḥ yam bhamaḥ mataḥ
samam disāsu ujjalāsu jina pāda nakhaṃsunā
passantāḥ abhinandanti canda ātapa manā janā
pavuccate yam nāma ādi kavīnam bhāva bodhanam

original: Yena kenaci vaṇṇena, bhāvo nāmā’ya mīrito.
analyzed: yena kenacid vaṇṇena bhāvaḥ nāmāya mīritaḥ

original: Nanu teye’va santāno, sāgarā na kulācalā;
Manampi mariyādaṃ ye, saṃvaṭṭepi jahanti no.
Aṅgaṅgi bhāvā sadisa, balabhāvā ca bandhane;

analyzed: saṃsagga ulaṅkatīnam yaḥ tam missanti pavuccati

original: Pasatthā munino pāda, nakha raṃsi mahānadī;
analyzed: pasatthā munino pāda nakha raṃsi mahānadī

original: Aho! Gāḷhaṃ nimuggepi, sukhayatye’va te jane.
analyzed: aho gāḷham nimugga ipi sukhayati eva te jane

original: Veso sabhāva madhuro, rūpaṃ netta rasāyanaṃ;
analyzed: veso sabhāva madhuraḥ rūpam netta rasāyanam

original: Madhū’va munino vācā, na sampīṇeti kaṃ janaṃ.
analyzed: madhu uva muninaḥ vācā na kam janam
rasappatī iti janakam jāyate yam vibhūsanam
rāga ānata bbhuta saroja mukham dharāya

original: Ko nāma passitu malaṃ khalu tāsa mantaṃ.
analyzed: kaḥ nāma passitu malam khalu mantam
iti saṅgharakkhita mahā sāmi viracite subodha alaṅkāre
tatas ucitya samullāsa vedinā kavinā param

original: Citta vutti visesā tu, bhāvayanti rase yato;
analyzed: citta vutti visesā tu bhāvayanti rase yato
virodhinā aññabhāvena yaḥ bhāvaḥ na tirohitaḥ

original: Jigucchā, vimhayo, ceva, samo ca nava ṭhāyino.
analyzed: jigucchā ca iva samaḥ ca nava ṭhāyino

original: Ye te caranti sīlena, te honti byabhicārino.
analyzed: ye te caranti sīlena te honti byabhicārinaḥ
sati ssā visādā bahitthā bahiddhā ka

original: Sattikā sātvikā (ka.) pya’nubhāvatte, visuṃ bhāvā bhavanti te.
analyzed: sattikā sātvikā visum bhāvāḥ bhavanti te

original: Thambho, paḷaya, romañcā, tathā seda, ssu, vepathu;
Yadā ratyādayo bhāvā, ṭhitisīlā na honti ce;
analyzed: yadā rati ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ ṭhiti sīlāḥ na honti ce

original: Tadā sabbepi te bhāvā, bhavanti byabhicārino.
analyzed: tadā sabbe pi te bhāvāḥ bhavanti byabhicārino
na eka hetum manaḥ vutti visesam ca vibhāvitum
bhāvam vibhāva anubhāvāḥ vaṇṇiyāḥ bandhane phuṭam
sa vibhāva anubhāvehi bhāvā te te yathāraham
citta vutti visesattā mānasā sattika aṅgataḥ
sāmājikāna mā ānandaḥ yaḥ bandhattha anusārinam
rasīyati iti rasaḥ nāma ayam īritaḥ

original: Assādiyatta mānīya, māno ṭhāye’va so raso.

analyzed: rammadesa kalā kāla vesa ādi paṭisevanā

original: Yutyā bhāvānubhāvā te, nibandhā posayanti naṃ;
analyzed: yutyā bhāva anubhāvā te nibandhā posayanti naṃ
vikāra akati ādīhi attanaḥ tha parassa vā
hassaḥ niddā sama ālasya mucchā di byabhicāribhi
paripose siyā hassaḥ bhiyya utthi pabhutīnam saḥ
kiñca ālakkhiya dijam tu tam hasitam
madhurassaram vihasitam aṃsa siraḥ kampam upahasitam

original: Jeṭṭhe majjhe’dhameti ettha majjhe adhameti padacchedo majjhe’dhame ca kamaso.
analyzed: jeṭṭhe majjhedhamā iti ettha majjhe adhamā iti padacchedaḥ majjhedhame ca
soka rūpaḥ tu karuṇaḥ na asataḥ
kodhaḥ mad śariya ādīhi pose mada ādibhi
nayana aruṇa tā ādīhi ruddaḥ nāma rasaḥ bhave
pata apa vikkama ādīhu ssāhaḥ vīra uti saññitaḥ
raṇa dāna dayā yogāḥ tividhaḥ bhave
bībhacchaḥ khobha nubbegī kamena karuṇā yutaḥ
nāsā vikūṇana ādīhi saṅka ādīhissa posanam
ṭhāyībhāvaḥ samaḥ mettā dayā āmoda ādi sambhavaḥ
bhāva ādīhi tad ukkaṃsaḥ santaḥ santa nisevitaḥ
iti saṅgharakkhita mahā sāmi viracite subodha alaṅkāre
